document_data.mainbody:
Irizzorl was a silver dragon wyrmling, living in the tower of the wizard Chazlauth Yarghorns Waterdeep residence,  sometime after the War of the Silver Marches in the late 15 century DR.
Irizzorl was considered to be a companion to the wizard Chazlauth. While living in his tower, the dragon often enjoyed terrorizing the several cats that the wizard kept in the tower alongside them.
